package.name: dualbrothers
package.readme: DualBrothers is a recombination detection software based on the dual Multiple Change-Point (MCP) model. This model allows for changes in topology and evolutionary rates across sites in a multiple sequence alignment. We use Bayesian approach together with an MCMC sampling to simulate from the posterior distribution of the dual MCP model parameters. The CLASSPATH for DualBrothers can be accessed through CLASSPATH_DUALBROTHERS. http://faculty.biomath.ucla.edu/msuchard/htdocs/DualBrothers/
